name: Blasted Fortress (itch)
description:
Blasted Fortress is a castle destruction game with some seasonal aspects, boss fights, and RPG features. You play as a bullied tribe that steals a cannon; using your tribal powers, you're able to put it to great use in sieges.
  • Use your cannon to bust buildings! Blocks shatter and fall away based on simple but strategic support rules; wood blocks support, stone blocks armor.
  • Successful sieges net Talismans, spent to passively upgrade your combat ability as well as buy one-shot voodoo spells to unleash on the battlefield.
  • Small secondary jobs can be attained from a job board to supplement your Talisman gains.
  • Resources gained during a siege can be manipulated to buy the ammunition you desire most to suit your play style.
  • Regular updates based on player feedback; release is not the end as we strive to continue improving the game!*
  • Fight one of four named bosses to unlock their strange ammunition types or fight randomly generated ones to supplement your gold stocks.
  • Level editor included!


*itch.io will be updated to the latest builds when possible, but please keep in mind that you will have to download them manually as opposed to our Desura release which automatically updates.
